test.create_query: CREATE TABLE test_shared_data_wide (json JSON(max_dynamic_paths=0)) ENGINE=MergeTree ORDER BY tuple() SETTINGS min_bytes_for_wide_part=1, min_rows_for_wide_part=1
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_shared_data_wide SELECT arrayMap(x -> tuple('key' || x, randomStringUTF8(16)), range(256))::Map(String, String) FROM numbers(150000)
INSERT INTO test_shared_data_wide SELECT arrayMap(x -> tuple('key' || x, randomStringUTF8(16)), range(256))::Map(String, String) FROM numbers(150000)
OPTIMIZE TABLE test_shared_data_wide FINAL SETTINGS mutations_sync=1
test.query: SELECT json.key0 FROM test_shared_data_wide FORMAT Null
SELECT json.non_existing_key FROM test_shared_data_wide FORMAT Null
SELECT json.key0, json.key1, json.key2, json.key3, json.key4 FROM test_shared_data_wide FORMAT Null
